name: Double Fine Productions
info:
• 别名: Double Fine
  • 别名: Double Fine Productions, Inc.
  • 生日: 2000年7月
detail: Double Fine Productions, Inc. is an American video game developer based in San Francisco, founded in July 2000 by Tim Schafer after his departure from LucasArts. Though the company's first two games Psychonauts and Brütal Legend were critically praised, both underperformed publishers' expectations.
